text: The twelfth season of the Oxygen reality television series Bad Girls Club is titled Bad Girls Club: Chicago, this is the seventh and final season to take place outside Los, Angeles. == Cast == === Original Bad Girls === Name Age Hometown Nickname Alexandria Rice 22 Sherwood, Wisconsin The Hot Model Alyssa Carswell 24 Fort Lauderdale, Florida The Luscious Loudmouth Brittany Britton 24 Louisville, Kentucky The Country Hustler Jada Cacchilli 28 Queens, NY The Rough Rhymer Jonica Booth 25 St. Louis, Missouri The Chick Magnet Linsey Jade + 21 Brooklyn, NY The Brooklyn Brat Loren Jordan 23 Mobile, Alabama The Mobile Belle === Replacement Bad Girls === Name Age Hometown Nickname Replaced Aysia Garza 22 Klein, Texas The Texas Temptress Linsey Dalila Ortiz 26 Chicago, Illinois The Chicago Wildcard Alyssa Raesha Clanton 23 Mobile, Alabama The Alabama Slammer Brittany
title: Bad Girls Club season 12
